Name: The baron got you again
About the game: The baron got you again is an Escape the Room game. In The baron got you again you play as a secret agent, prisonner from a cell in the middle of Argentina, inside the secret base of the vile Baron Von Rimmel. Your mission : escape, and as fast as possible. Search the different rooms to discover the bunker's exit without being noticed. The game requires a minimum Room Scale of 2 by 1.5 meters, but a Room Scale of 4 by 3 meters provided with a greater experience. The game only support the HTC Vive.
